result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Edwin De Jesus

records.addlTxt: signed by Judge Michael O. Bohren on 10/28/22
Review hearing on December 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

12:09 PM Defendant Edwin De Jesus in court.  Attorney Michael F Torphy in court for Edwin De Jesus.  Prosecuting attorney Mary Caitlin Brejcha in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Court addresses the issue of the competency evaluation in 22CM1226.
Defendant has not received a response from Dr. Jurek.
Court vacates the order for Dr. Jurek to complete the evaluation and orders a second competency evaluation to be completed by Dr. Scheonecker, or if he is unable to accept the appointment, Dr. VerWert or Dr. Westendorf.
Court orders the competency report to be filed by 12/15/22.
Review hearing scheduled for December 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

1:46 PM Defendant Edwin De Jesus in court.  Attorney Michael F Torphy in court for Edwin De Jesus.  Prosecuting attorney Alyssa M Jay in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense requests more time for the 2nd competency report to be completed and filed.
Parties agree that the competency report filed in 22CM1226 will also apply to 22CM854.
Review hearing scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Review hearing on October 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Edwin De Jesus
Current: 1249 Aldoro Dr, Waukesha, WI 53188 United States  (Effective: 09-14-2022)
Prior: 430 Kimberly Dr. Apt. 11, Waukesha, WI 53188
Hearing on September 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

2:42 PM Attorney Michael F Torphy appeared by video for Edwin DeJesus on 22CM854.  Attorney J Andrew Herbers Jr. in court for Edwin DeJesus on 22CM1226.  Prosecuting attorney Shawn N Woller in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Torphy requests the defendant's appearance be waived for this hearing.
Court addresses Attorney Herbers' motion to withdraw.
Both counsel have signed a substitution of counsel form.
Attorney Herbers to file the substitition of counsel form.
Court accepts the substitution of counsel.
Based on defendant's non-appearance Court orders capias STAYED until the next court date.
Hearing scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection

signed by Judge Michael O. Bohren on 8/18/22 for Dr. Anthony W Jurek.

1:44 PM Prosecuting attorney Andrea M Will in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney J Andrew Herbers Jr. in court for Edwin De Jesus. 
Attorney Herbers gives status of the defendant's location.
Defense requests a second competency evaluation based on the findings in the report filed 8/8/22.
Court orders a second evaluation be completed by Dr. Deborah Collins and report filed prior to the next court date.
Review hearing scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

**Dr. Collins was unable to conduct the second evaluation. Court appoints Dr. Anthony W Jurek to do the evaluation.**

01:47 PM Attorney J Andrew Herbers in court.   Defendant Edwin De Jesus did not appear.   Alyssa M Jay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense believes the defendant is currently in custody at Winnebago.
Clerk confirms the defendant's location and that he is expected to remain there for 14 days.
Defendant to appear by video for the next hearing.  Review hearing scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Hearing on August 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

records.addlTxt: appointing Attorney Andy Herbers
Signed Order for Competency Examination
Proposed order compentency
To Seal Victim/Witness Identification Key, signed by Judge Michael O. Bohren on July 14, 2022
Review hearing on August 18, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.  Defendant to have no VIOLENT contact with victim A/witness A listed in the Criminal Complaint/Victim Identification Key.  Defendant is not to share, reproduce or distribute any personal and/or identifying information about the crime victim(s), except to their attorney.

02:06 PM Defendant Edwin De Jesus in court, in custody, with State Public Defender Law Intern.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint and waives reading of complaint.  
Service admitted/advised of charges and potential penalties.  
Court advises of right to an attorney.  Defendant is eligible for State Public Defender representation.  An attorney will be appointed.
NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.
THE COURT ORDERS A  COMPETENCY EVALUATION PURSUANT TO SEC.. 971.14(2) SUA SPONTE.  Court orders the defendant be examined by the Wisconsin Forensic Unit.  To be done as an outpatient basis within 30 days.  Review hearing scheduled for August 18, 2022 at 03:30 pm.  Check Case scheduled for August 11, 2022.
